import React from "react" import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Row, Col, Form, Input, FormGroup, Label, Button } from "reactstrap" // import csImg from "../../assets/img/pages/rocket.png" import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/@vuexy/breadCrumbs/BreadCrumb" import csImg from "../../assets/img/pages/contact-us.png" import "../../assets/scss/pages/coming-soon.scss" import Countdown from "react-countdown-now" import { history } from "../../../src/history" class ContactUs extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { isLoading: false, myProfile:null, feedback: '' } } componentDidMount = async()=>{ await this.isLogin(); } isLogin = async() =>{ if (localStorage.getItem('account') == undefined || localStorage.getItem('account') == null) { history.push("/pages/login") }else{ var myProfile = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('account')) console.log('myProfile', myProfile) this.setState({myProfile: myProfile}) } } renderTimer = ({ days, hours, minutes, seconds }) => { return (

{days}

Days

{hours}

Hours

{minutes}

Minutes

{seconds}

Seconds

) } render() { return (

Butuh bantuan? kontak kami!

 {/*
*/}
Kontak MSTD Dept. 3302/3304
{/*

If you would like to be notified when our app is live, Please subscribe to our mailing list by entering your email.

*/} {/*

MSTD Dept.

*/}
this.setState({feedback: val.target.value})} />
) } } export default ContactUs
